Survey.thanks: Thank you for completing the survey
Recommendation.notfound: No se encontraron cervezas que cumplan con los filtros seleccionados
Find.craft.beer: Find the perfect craft beer for you!
beerDescription1: We specialize in selling high-quality commercial and craft beers to go.
beerDescription2: Our mission is to offer our customers a wide variety of beers, from well-known commercial brands to unique craft productions.
foundedBy: Founded on August 6, 2022 by Ana Lizardi and Cristina Tenorio, we have been committed to offering superior quality beers made with the best ingredients and traditional processes.
passion: At MALTA MIA, we are passionate about the world of beer and we want to share that passion with you. As experts in the sector, we are dedicated to carefully selecting the best beers so that you can enjoy unique experiences and exceptional flavors.
survey.question1: 1. Have you tried any craft beer?
survey.question2: 2. What kind of beer style do you like?
survey.optionExperimentar: I am willing to experience new flavors
survey.question3: 3. What level of bitterness or IBUs do you like in a craft beer?
survey.question4: 4. What kind of flavors do you prefer in a craft beer?
survey.optionNinguno: it does not matter to me
survey.question5: 5. What is your preferred alcohol level?
survey.question6: 6. Would you like your beer to have any additional ingredients?
survey.optionIndiferente: it does not matter to me
survey.recommendationTitle: We have found the perfect beer for you!
